title: Broadstone Net Lease targets $500M in new build-to-suit projects for 2026-2027 growth
excerpt: Broadstone Net Lease (BNL) reports strong 2024 results with $1.43 AFFO/share, strategic portfolio repositioning & $500M build-to-suit plans for 2025.
